title: Vue 3 Carousel - MasterControl
description: This project was one of the big projects I took on at MasterControl. This project started as a request to add a carousel with some speakers to the home page for an upcoming event. as such, i got an opportunity to simply build a feature that met the specifications with no restrictions. Since vue was already a partially adopted tool, I decided to go with Vue's carousel.

title: Speaker API Integration - MasterControl
description: This was another addition I made to the events page at MasterControl. This feature displays dynamic cards with speaker information as it comes in from a constantly-updating API.

title: Angular Timesheet App - Mtec
description: This project is a timesheet app built with angular. it tracks employee timecards across each week and displays this data dynamically grouped by individuals or departments.
